page.title: 12Sale for Ethiopia
page.content:
On the 9th May 1985{Yellow Class} held a{sale}to help raise money to provide food, water and blankets for the starving people of{Ethiopia.} Children from the class spent several weeks preparing for the sale. We made sweets, television and pop star badges, note books, pencil holders, colouring books and knitted purses. We also sold books, comics and drinks. We held the sale in the playground at 10.30 a.m. during morning break and the three other classes from our school came to buy from our stalls. By the end of break everything that we had made was sold. We raised nearly Â£30 and we hope that it will bring joy to some of the starving Ethiopians.
{ }
